## Source: amazon-inspector (54520ff73a8cd962cb9ab3db426b6c93987e6b616edf752e0e5f6f346293af1b)
The package stark-recurser was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (424243b64172b0ade3ab912a7a4b142ff734bc8273f3fb61800215bf53b97dab)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'stark-recurser' @ 5.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
